note.p: Scottish agriculturalist and meteorologist. Of Pilmuir, Largo, Leven, Fife. Active member of the council of the Highland and Agricultural Society; editor of its Transactions, 1860-66. Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh from 1859.
Census returns of Scotland 1871 (The National Archives of Scotland: Largo 1/4)
Proceedings of the Royal Society of Edinburgh 7 (1869–72): 532
